Method Detail

add

public abstract long add(Location point)
Adds the point the set, and computes all its neighbors upon its addition.

Parameters:
point - The point to be added to the set.
Returns:
The id of the location, which may have changed if the location gets merged with another existing location.

addToCluster

public void addToCluster(long locationId,
                         long clusterId)
Adds a location to a cluster.

Parameters:
locationId - The id of the location to be added to the cluster.
clusterId - The id of the cluster to add the location to.

changeClusterId

public void changeClusterId(long oldId,
                            long newId)
Relabels a cluster with a new id. This is used when merging clusters.

Parameters:
oldId - Old cluster id.
newId - New cluster id.

getAllClusters

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getAllClusters()
Returns the ids of all clusters in the database.

Returns:
A collection of cluster ids.

getAllLocations

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getAllLocations()
Returns the ids of all locations in the database.

Returns:
A collection of location ids.

getClusterId

public long getClusterId(long locationId)
Gets the cluster id for a particular location id.

Parameters:
locationId - The location id.
Returns:
Cluster id, or -1 if point is not in a cluster.

getClusterIds

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getClusterIds(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> locations)
Returns a collection of all of the cluster ids that appear in collection of locations

Parameters:
locations - The set of locations to check
Returns:
The cluster ids that occur in the collection of locations.

getLocation

public abstract Location getLocation(long locationId)
Retrieves a location from the database.

Parameters:
locationId - The location id to retrieve.

getLocationsForCluster

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> getLocationsForCluster(long clusterId)
Gets all of the locations contained in the specified cluster

Parameters:
clusterId - The id of the cluster.
Returns:
A collection of location ids.

getNewClusterId

public long getNewClusterId()
Returns the next available cluster id.

Returns:
An available cluster id.

getWindowLength

public abstract int getWindowLength()
Returns:
The window length, in samples or seconds, depending on the value of usesTimeBasedWindow().

newLocation

public abstract Location newLocation(double timestamp)
Creates a new empty location with the specified timestamp.

Parameters:
timestamp - Timestamp, in milliseconds, associated with the new location.

pctOfWindowRequiredToBeStationary

public abstract float pctOfWindowRequiredToBeStationary()
Returns the percentage of the window that must be considered stationary for a new location to be created.

usesTimeBasedWindow

public abstract boolean usesTimeBasedWindow()
Returns true if the algorithm is using a fixed time length for the window, or false if the window contains a fixed number of samples.
